verses.verse: Now Mosheh <WH4872> kept <WH1961> <WH8804> <WH7462> <WH8802> the flock <WH6629> of Yitro <WH3503> his father in Torah <WH2859> <WH8802>, the Kohen <WH3548> of Midian <WH4080>: and he led <WH5090> <WH8799> the flock <WH6629> to the backside <WH310> of the desert <WH4057>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> to the mountain <WH2022> of 'Elohim <WH430>, even to Horev <WH2722>.

And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> unto him in a flame <WH3827> of fire <WH784> out of the midst <WH8432> of a bush <WH5572>: and he looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and, behold, the bush <WH5572> burned <WH1197> <WH8802> with fire <WH784>, and the bush <WH5572> was not consumed <WH398> <WH8794>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will now turn aside <WH5493> <WH8799>, and see <WH7200> <WH8799> this great <WH1419> sight <WH4758>, why <WH4069> the bush <WH5572> is not burnt <WH1197> <WH8799>.

And when the YY <WH3068> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that he turned aside <WH5493> <WH8804> to see <WH7200> <WH8800>, 'Elohim <WH430> called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto him out of the midst <WH8432> of the bush <WH5572>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Mosheh <WH4872>, Mosheh <WH4872>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Here am I.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Draw not nigh <WH7126> <WH8799> hither <WH1988>: put off <WH5394> <WH8798> thy shoes <WH5275> from off thy feet <WH7272>, for the place <WH4725> whereon <WH834> thou standest <WH5975> <WH8802> is holy <WH6944> ground <WH127>.

Moreover he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I am the 'Elohim <WH430> of thy father <WH1>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Avraham <WH85>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and the 'Elohim <WH430> of Ya`akov <WH3290>. And Mosheh <WH4872> hid <WH5641> <WH8686> his face <WH6440>; for he was afraid <WH3372> <WH8804> to look <WH5027> <WH8687> upon 'Elohim <WH430>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799>, I have surely <WH7200> <WH8800> seen <WH7200> <WH8804> the affliction <WH6040> of my people <WH5971> which are in Egypt <WH4714>, and have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> their cry <WH6818> by reason <WH6440> of their taskmasters <WH5065> <WH8802>; for I know <WH3045> <WH8804> their sorrows <WH4341>;

And I am come down <WH3381> <WH8799> to deliver <WH5337> <WH8687> them out of the hand <WH3027> of the Egyptians <WH4714>, and to bring <WH5927> <WH8687> them up out of that land <WH776> unto a good <WH2896> land <WH776> and a large <WH7342>, unto a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>; unto the place <WH4725> of the Kanahanites <WH3669>, and the Hittites <WH2850>, and the Amorites <WH567>, and the Perizzites <WH6522>, and the Hivites <WH2340>, and the Y'vusis <WH2983>.

Now therefore, behold, the cry <WH6818> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> is come <WH935> <WH8804> unto me: and I have also seen <WH7200> <WH8804> the oppression <WH3906> wherewith the Egyptians <WH4714> oppress <WH3905> <WH8801> them.

Come <WH3212> <WH8798> now therefore, and I will send <WH7971> <WH8799> thee unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, that thou mayest bring forth <WH3318> <WH8685> my people <WH5971> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> out of Egypt <WH4714>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto 'Elohim <WH430>, Who am I, that I should go <WH3212> <WH8799> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, and that I should bring forth <WH3318> <WH8686> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> out of Egypt <WH4714> ?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Certainly I will be with thee; and this shall be a token <WH226> unto thee, that <WH3588> I have sent <WH7971> <WH8804> thee: When thou hast brought forth <WH3318> <WH8687> the people <WH5971> out of Egypt <WH4714>, ye shall serve <WH5647> <WH8799> 'Elohim <WH430> upon this mountain <WH2022>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto 'Elohim <WH430>, Behold, when I come <WH935> <WH8802> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and shall say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, The 'Elohim <WH430> of your fathers <WH1> hath sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me unto you; and they shall say <WH559> <WH8804> to me, What is his name <WH8034>? what shall I say <WH559> <WH8799> unto them?

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, I AM <WH1961> <WH8799> THAT I AM <WH1961> <WH8799>: and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thus shalt thou say <WH559> <WH8799> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, I AM hath sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me unto you.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> moreover <WH5750> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Thus shalt thou say <WH559> <WH8799> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, The YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of your fathers <WH1>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Avraham <WH85>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and the 'Elohim <WH430> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, hath sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me unto you: this is my name <WH8034> for ever <WH5769>, and this is my memorial <WH2143> unto all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.

Go <WH3212> <WH8798>, and gather <WH622> the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> together <WH622> <WH8804>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, The YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of your fathers <WH1>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Avraham <WH85>, of Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and of Ya`akov <WH3290>, appeared <WH7200> <WH8738> unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, I have surely <WH6485> <WH8800> visited <WH6485> <WH8804> you, and seen that which is done <WH6213> <WH8803> to you in Egypt <WH4714>:

And I have said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will bring <WH5927> <WH8686> you up out of the affliction <WH6040> of Egypt <WH4714> unto the land <WH776> of the Kanahanites <WH3669>, and the Hittites <WH2850>, and the Amorites <WH567>, and the Perizzites <WH6522>, and the Hivites <WH2340>, and the Y'vusis <WH2983>, unto a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.

And they shall hearken <WH8085> <WH8804> to thy voice <WH6963>: and thou shalt come <WH935> <WH8804>, thou and the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, unto the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, and ye shall say <WH559> <WH8804> unto him, The YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of the Hebrews <WH5680> hath met <WH7136> <WH8738> with us: and now let us go <WH3212> <WH8799>, we beseech thee, three <WH7969> days <WH3117> ' journey <WH1870> into the wilderness <WH4057>, that we may sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8799> to the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>.
And I am sure <WH3045> <WH8804> that the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> will not let <WH5414> <WH8799> you go <WH1980> <WH8800>, no, not by a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>.

And I will stretch out <WH7971> <WH8804> my hand <WH3027>, and smite <WH5221> <WH8689> Egypt <WH4714> with all my wonders <WH6381> <WH8737> which I will do <WH6213> <WH8799> in the midst <WH7130> thereof: and after <WH310> that he will let you go <WH7971> <WH8762>.

And I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> this people <WH5971> favour <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the Egyptians <WH4714>: and it shall come to pass, that, when ye go <WH3212> <WH8799>, ye shall not go <WH3212> <WH8799> empty <WH7387>:

But every woman <WH802> shall borrow <WH7592> <WH8804> of her neighbour <WH7934>, and of her that sojourneth <WH1481> <WH8802> in her house <WH1004>, jewels <WH3627> of silver <WH3701>, and jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>, and raiment <WH8071>: and ye shall put <WH7760> <WH8804> them upon your sons <WH1121>, and upon your daughters <WH1323>; and ye shall spoil <WH5337> <WH8765> the Egyptians <WH4714>.
